---
title: Extending the documentation
---

# Prerequisites

The documention used [`quarto`](https://quarto.org/)  and `.qmd` quarto markdown (a superset of markdown).

see [documentation](https://quarto.org/docs/reference) 

# Configuration 

The configuration for the static documentation site is defined in `chatbot/doc/_quarto.yaml`.

# Creating or modifying parts of the documentation

All documents are stored in `.qmd` format in `chatbot/doc`.
Creation or modification of the documentation does not require local installation
of `quarto`.

Once finished, directly `push` (if you can ;)) or open a pull request to the `bot_quarto_docs` branch. This will trigger the `github` workflow defined in `build_quarto_docs.yaml`.
